responsibilities: We are seeking a Data Engineer with strong experience in BAU (Business As Usual) support and cloud-based data pipeline development. This role will focus on maintaining and enhancing our existing data integration frameworks while building new cloud-native solutions.
requirements: 4+ years of experience in data engineering or integration roles
Strong experience with Azure cloud services (Azure Data Factory, Synapse Analytics, Azure Functions)
Proven track record in BAU support and production environment management
Proficiency in SQL and Python for data transformation
Experience with data integration patterns and best practices
Knowledge of RESTful APIs and web services integration
Strong understanding of data warehousing concepts
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
